Desc.entry: Registered Social Landlord which manages a number of properties transferred from Sheffield Homes, including Manor Park Estate, Harold Lambert Court, as well as properties in Wisewood, Loxley and Wadsley. Vacant properties are advertised via Sheffield Homes. People registered on Sheffield City Council's housing list are eligible to make bids for properties.

ContactName.entry: Darren Burton/Clare Atkinson, Housing Services Managers
